name: ash-nazg
description: WordPress plugin that integrates Pantheon Public API into the WordPress admin dashboard

scripts.copy:pds: mkdir -p assets/pds assets/pds-design-tokens assets/images && cp -r ../pds-core/src/foundations assets/pds/ && cp -r ../pds-core/src/utilities assets/pds/ && cp ../pds-core/public/design-tokens/pds-design-tokens-light-mode.css assets/pds-design-tokens/ && cp ../pds-core/public/pantheon-logo-light-mode.png assets/images/ && cp ../pds-core/public/pantheon-logo-dark-mode.png assets/images/
scripts.prebuild:css: npm run copy:pds && npm run copy:chartjs
scripts.watch:css: npm run copy:pds && npm run copy:chartjs && sass --load-path=assets/sass assets/sass/admin.scss assets/css/admin.css --watch --style=expanded
